doc:
Bill Burr https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Burr 0 William Frederic Burr (born June 10, 1968) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, voice artist, writer, musician, producer, celebrity podcaster and social critic. He has released six stand-up specials. Outside of stand-up, he is known for hosting the Monday Morning Podcast, as a regular cast member of Chappelle's Show, playing Patrick Kuby in the AMC crime drama series Breaking Bad, and creating and starring in the Netflix animated sitcom F Is for Family. Burr also co-founded the All Things Comedy network. William_Frederic_Burr ( born June_10_,_1968 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , voice_artist , writer_,_musician_,_producer_,_celebrity_podcaster and social_critic . He has_released six_stand-up_specials . Outside of stand-up , he is_known for hosting the_Monday_Morning_Podcast , as a_regular_cast_member of Chappelle 's_Show , playing Patrick_Kuby in the_AMC_crime_drama_series Breaking Bad , and creating_and_starring in the_Netflix_animated_sitcom_F Is for Family . Burr also co-founded the_All_Things_Comedy_network .
